title: Fossil Finder
features: Created an interactive experience showcased at the Boston Children’s museum that challenged players to find and retrieve specific dinosaur fossils from a nearby ‘excavation site’
Utilized the Java-based Processing language and Arduino boards to drive a GUI, RFID scanner, and servo motors to validate and reward the retrieval of correct fossils

title: Water Bottle Throwing Robot
features: Programmed a robotic arm to accurately pick up and throw water bottles at targets
Designed a C++ program with the use of pthreads to control multiple servos simultaneously

title: MBTA LED Map
features: Created a live-updating version of the MBTA full subway map that shows current vehicle positions through LED lights placed at each stop on the map
Wrote a Python script that parsed data from MBTA’s v3 API to communicate with Arduinos over aserial connection to light up the appropriate LEDs
